title: Aural set, Spring symph - 1st phrase rhythm

content.description: You will hear an excerpt from a symphony. First, the entire excerpt will be played. Then the first two phrases will be played once, followed by one playing of the first four phrases. Finally, the entire excerpt will be played a second and third time. Before listening to the entire excerpt for the first time, please look over the questions.
content.question: Which of the following best represents the rhythm of the first phrase?

choices.label: The time signature of the Choice A line is cut time. Answer A has four measures. The rhythm of measure 1 is: eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth, eighth, and eighth, rest. The rhythm of measure 2 is: eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth, eighth, and eighth, rest. The rhythm of measure 3 is: eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth, rest. The rhythm of measure 4 is: eighth, eighth rest, and eighth.

The time signature of the Choice B line is cut time. Answer B has 4 measures with an anacrusis. The rhythm of the anacrusis is: triplet of eighth notes. The rhythm of measure 1 is: eighth, eighth rest, triplet of eighths, eighth, eighth rest, and a triplet of eighths. The rhythm of measure 2 is: eighth, eighth rest, triplet of eights, eighth, eighth rest, and a triplet of eighths. The rhythm of measure 3 is: eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth rest. The rhythm of measure 4 is: eighth.

The time signature of the Choice C line is cut time. Answer C has 4 measures with an anacrusis. The rhythm of the anacrusis is: eight, eighth. The rhythm of measure 1 is: eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth. The rhythm of measure 2 is: eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth. The rhythm of measure 3 is: eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth rest. The rhythm of measure 4 is: eighth.

The time signature of the Choice D line is cut time. Answer D has 4 measures and an anacrusis. The rhythm of the anacrusis is: sixteenth, sixteenth. The rhythm of measure 1 is: quarter, eighth rest, sixteenth, sixteenth, quarter, eighthâ€¦

content.answer: The time signature of the Choice C line is cut time. Answer C has 4 measures with an anacrusis. The rhythm of the anacrusis is: eight, eighth. The rhythm of measure 1 is: eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth. The rhythm of measure 2 is: eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth. The rhythm of measure 3 is: eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, eighth rest, eighth, and eighth rest. The rhythm of measure 4 is: eighth.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
